cg2101: Wanna learn the military secret to falling asleep in 2 minutes?
cg2102: Step 1: Relax all the muscles in your face
cg2104: Step 2: Drop your shoulders and arms as far down as they go
cg2105: Step 3: Breathe out, relaxing your chest
cg2106: Step 4: Relax your legs, starting from the thighs and working down
cg2107: Step 5: Whisper 'don't think, don't think, don't think' over and over again for 10 seconds
cg2108: Are you still awake??? That was it!

cd0101_label: How do I get the money?
cd0101: Just ask your parents! They keep the money for you, just like a bank!
cd0102: Gimi keeps track of how much your parents owe you. If you want your money, ask your parents!
cd0201_label: How do I pay with Gimi?
cd0201: You can't! You need to ask your parents to pay for you.
cd0202: Gimi keeps track of how much your parents owe you. If you want to pay, ask your parents!
cd0301: That's the day you get your money!
cd0303_week: You need to wait for your money! It comes once a week
cd0303_month: You need to wait for your money! It comes once a month
cd0401_label: When do I get my money?
cd0401: You have %1$d days left until next payday!
cd0501_label: How much money have I earned?
cd0601_label: How can I earn more money?

cd0602: Ever tried doing something fun for work? Suggest a chore!
cd0701_label: How do I buy my goal?
cd0701: You can't pay with Gimi, but you can ask your parents to buy your goal for you!
cd0702: The money in your piggybank it what your parents owe you!
cd0703: So if you saved up for your goal, they should pay for it!

cd1301_label: How many parents can I have?
cd1401: Before digital money, people used coins.
cd1402: And children used to save their coins in porcelain pigs, piggybanks!
cd1403: ...and now money is online, so I'm here too, but made of pixels!
cd1501_label: How do I pay with the Gimi card?
cd1501: That's easy! Want to pay in a store or online?
cd1502: First, make sure you have enough money on your card
cd1503: When you click "PAY", the store will ask for your card details
cd1504: Do you know where to find them in the app?
cd1505: OK! The cashier will tell you the price
cd1506: Make sure you have enough money on your card!
cd1507: Now, put the card in the terminal, and press your PIN.
cd1508: Just go to your card, and click "card details"
cd1509: Then type all these numbers in the correct fields, and you're done!
cd1510: Good! Then you're ready to pay!
cd1512: The PIN is the secret 4 digit code to your card
cd1513: You need it when you pay with the card!
cd1515: The terminal is the thingy you put your card in when you pay in a store.
cd1517: You can learn more about paying here!
cd1518: If you forget your PIN, you can see it in the app!
cd1601_label: How do I get money on the card?
cd1601: Do you have money in your account?
cd1602: Good! You can now transfer money from the account to your card
cd1603: Just go to card, and press "transfer"
cd1605: You need to wait for your payday.
cd1606: Maybe earn extra money by doing chores?
cd1701_label: Does my Gimi card work online?
cd1701: Sure it does! Why wouldn't it?
cd1801_label: How do I get a Gimi Card?
cd1801: Parents order the Gimi Card for you!
cd1803: It's a decision only adults can make!
cd1804: Tell someone else that they're cool!
